verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
Jesus we love You
Bow down before You
Praises and worship to the King
Alleluia-alleluia-alleluia-allelu

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus we love You
bow down before You
Praises and worship to the King
Worthy-worthy-Jesus is worthy
Worthy-worthy-Jesus is King

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jesus we love you
bow down before You
Praises and worship, this we bring
